meanings.sent1: The jeweler desilvered the old coins to reveal their true value.
meanings.sent2: The company desilvered the mirrors before recycling them.
meanings.sent3: The magician desilvered the spoon, turning it into a plain metal rod.
meanings.sent4: The artist desilvered the canvas, stripping away the shiny layers to create a new masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The scientist desilvered the solution, separating the silver particles from the rest.

meanings.sent1: The desilvered mirror reflected a distorted image.
meanings.sent2: The desilvered jewelry had a dull appearance.
meanings.sent3: The desilvered vase looked plain but elegant on the shelf.
meanings.sent4: The desilvered surface gleamed in the sunlight, devoid of any silver sheen.
meanings.sent5: The desilvered object felt lighter without its silver coating.
